alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 5:21PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, mixed precipitation. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed icy precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1/2 inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as zero. * WHERE...Jackson and Ouachita Parishes. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact any commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
